member.name: M:Beyova.RestApi.ApiHandlerBase.Prepare(System.Web.HttpRequest)
member.summary:
Prepares the specified request.
This method would be called before ProcessRoute. It can be used to help you to do some preparation, such as get something from headers or cookie for later actions. ou can save them in Thread data so that you can get them later in ProcessRoute, Invoke, PackageOutput ,etc. If any exception is throw from this method, the process flow would be interrupted.

member.name: M:Beyova.RestApi.ApiHandlerBase.InitializeContext(System.Web.HttpRequest,Beyova.RestApi.RuntimeContext)
member.summary:
Initializes the context.
This method would be called after ProcessRoute and before Invoke. It can be used to help you to do some context initialization, such as get something from database for later actions. ou can save them in Thread data so that you can get them later in Invoke, PackageOutput ,etc. If any exception is throw from this method, the process flow would be interrupted.

member.name: M:Beyova.RestApi.ApiHandlerBase.Invoke(System.Object,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Web.HttpRequest,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary:
Invokes the specified method information.
Invoke action would regard to method parameter to use difference logic. Following steps show the IF-ELSE case. When it is hit, other would not go through.
If input parameter count is 0, invoke without parameter object.
If input parameter count is 1 and key is not empty or null, invoke using key.
If input parameter count is 1 and key is empty or null, invoke using key, try to get JSON object from request body and convert to object for invoke.
If input parameter count more than 1, try read JSON data to match parameters by name (ignore case) in root level, then invoke.

member.name: T:Beyova.IBinaryStorageHelper`2
member.typeparam: The type of the t binary storage meta data.
The type of the t binary storage criteria.

summary.remarks: This method is to create meta in database and get authenticated uri for client to upload blob. Before you call CommitBinaryStorage to set state as Committed, the state of blob is CommitPending, and might be deleted by maintenance script. And, the uri can be expired according to service security settings. By default, it is 10 min since created stamp.

This method is to get authenticated uri for client to download blob. Only when the blob information can be found in database and the state is valid for download, a Uri would be returned. And, the uri can be expired according to service security settings. By default, it is 10 min since created stamp.

member.name: T:Beyova.DualToken
member.summary:
Class DualToken. This class cannot be inherited. DualToken is used when a random token is required and needs to be safely stored in somewhere for later use by RSA. Common procedures:
A pair of RSA keys are generated. Member A get public key while Member B get private key.
Member A: new DualToken(), export token for storing in DB or file using GetTokenForStore.
Member A call GetTokenForValidate to get token for validation, and give it to Member B.
Member B get token, decrypt it using private key, get raw token and give it to A for validation.
Member A call Validate using token from Member B to see whether it is authorized.
